Lat/Long degrees.

As far as I know, with ModelTypeGeographic the datum is specified
seperately via the GeographicTypeGeoKey.

Frank Warmerdam
warmerda@pci.on.ca

Geotiff_Information:
   Version: 1
   Key_Revision: 1.0
   Tagged_Information:
      ModelTiepointTag (2,3):
         0                0                0                
         -117.641169      33.903634        0                
      ModelPixelScaleTag (1,3):
         0.000650888889   0.000538666667   0                
      End_Of_Tags.
   Keyed_Information:
      GTModelTypeGeoKey (Short,1): ModelTypeGeographic
      GTRasterTypeGeoKey (Short,1): RasterPixelIsArea
      GTCitationGeoKey (Ascii,17): "LONG/LAT    E000"
      GeographicTypeGeoKey (Short,1): GCS_NAD27
      GeogLinearUnitsGeoKey (Short,1): Linear_Meter
      GeogAngularUnitsGeoKey (Short,1): Angular_Degree
      End_Of_Keys.
   End_Of_Geotiff.
